pokeball.name: Poké Ball
pokeball.description: A tool for catching wild Pokémon.

greatball.name: Great Ball
greatball.description: A ball with a decent catch rate.

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.description: A ball with a high rate of success.

masterball.name: Master Ball
masterball.description: The best Poké Ball with the ultimate performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

safariball.name: Safari Ball
safariball.description: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Safari Zone.

sportball.name: Sport Ball
sportball.description: A special Poké Ball that is used in Catching Contests.

fastball.name: Fast Ball
fastball.description: A Poké Ball that has a higher catch rate on fast Pokémon or those likely to flee.

friendball.name: Friend Ball
friendball.description: A special Poké Ball that makes a wild Pokémon friendly when caught. Has a standard catch rate.

heavyball.name: Heavy Ball
heavyball.description: A Poké Ball that is more effective on very heavy Pokémon.

levelball.name: Level Ball
levelball.description: A Poké Ball that is more effective against Pokémon of a lower level than your own.

loveball.name: Love Ball
loveball.description: A Poké Ball that works best on Pokémon of the opposite gender but the same species as your active Pokémon.

lureball.name: Lure Ball
lureball.description: A Poké Ball that is more effective on Pokémon hooked by a fishing rod.

moonball.name: Moon Ball
moonball.description: A Poké Ball that is more effective on Pokémon that evolve using a Moon Stone.

premierball.name: Premier Ball
premierball.description: A rare ball made in commemoration of some event.
